General_Description: '''I Need a Hero''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: After Kassandra helped the [[Sparta]]ns win [[Megaris]], a Commander was eager to strike against the [[Athens|Athenians]], yet a certain Athenian commander barred his triumph.
Section_Trivia: *The name of the memory is a reference to {{Wiki|Bonnie Tyler}}'s song {{Wiki|Holding Out for a Hero}}, the chorus of which begins with the words "I need a hero."
